thread.section_title: Millesime Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful hotel
thread.title_full: Wonderful hotel - Review of Millesime Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: HullRory
title: Wonderful hotel
text:
My daughters and I recently stayed for 3 nights.
We chose this hotel due to the positive reviews it had received and we were not disappointed at all.
It is a beautiful small hotel in a boutique style, we had 2 superior rooms which were of an excellent standard. Very clean with an amazing large shower.
The staff were very friendly.
The hotel is in a great central location down a quiet street. Just around the corner are lovely shops and great eateries.
We shall definitely return.
